definition: famous actor
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
surname Jue
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Today Dong is something of a celebrity in Chinese business circles.
sentences.chinese: 如今，董明珠已是商圈里名角。

sentences.english: Then she soon became an abuser and a star inside the group.
sentences.chinese: 然后不久她加入了施虐并成为里面的一个名角。

sentences.english: Director is a Beijing Opera star, very admire to Mr. Shen. But Mr.
sentences.chinese: 卢局长是京剧名角，对沈先生非常仰慕。
